selections.name: SPRING IS HERE
selections.reason: Significant class drop from Listed Stakes company to Maiden. Holds the highest back-class speed figure (87) in the field. The 2-1 Morning Line reflects this superiority.

selections.name: THIS GUY
selections.reason: Consistent speed figures (77, 84) in recent starts. Just missed by a neck last time out. The clear main danger to the top pick.

selections.name: PASS ME IF YOU CAN
selections.reason: Showed improvement with a 72 figure recently. A logical exotic filler underneath the top two.

selections.name: DUSTY ROCK
selections.reason: Ran an even 6th in debut with a 66 figure. Open to improvement in second start.

danger_horse.name: THIS GUY
danger_horse.reason: Recent speed figure of 84 is competitive with the top pick's best. If the favorite falters on the drop, this horse is the likely winner.

selections.name: I'M SPARTACUS
selections.reason: Solid recent form with figures of 65 and 64. Won two starts back and finished a close 4th last time. Fits the 'Stalker' profile well here.

selections.name: SOVEREIGN BANTER
selections.reason: Model of consistency with recent finishes of 3rd, 2nd, 2nd. Figures in the high 50s make him a must-use in exotics.

selections.name: SPORTING HERO (GB)
selections.reason: Has back numbers of 70 and 62. The wide draw is a concern, but the price (8-1) offers value.

selections.name: BILLBOA (GB)
selections.reason: Dropping into a handicap where his back class (figures of 73, 83) could wake him up at a price.

danger_horse.name: MEHMAN (GB)
danger_horse.reason: Reserve runner. If he draws in, he becomes a top contender with a recent 74 speed figure.

selections.name: MOUNT RUAPEHU
selections.reason: In peak form with a win and a 2nd in last two starts. Speed figures (60, 54) are tops in this field. The horse to beat.

selections.name: WINEMAKER (FR)
selections.reason: Coming off a win with a 59 figure. Consistent runner who should be right there at the finish.

selections.name: BALLYMAGREEHAN (GB)
selections.reason: Had a dip in form last time (50) but ran a 58 prior. Capable of bouncing back.

selections.name: ALEX BELARDO
selections.reason: Consistent mid-pack finisher with figures around 50. Good for the bottom of the superfecta.

danger_horse.name: WINEMAKER (FR)
danger_horse.reason: Recent winner with matching speed figures to the top pick.

selections.name: LITTLE EMPIRE
selections.reason: Standout on paper. Recent speed figures of 84, 83, and 80 show immense consistency and a class edge over this field.

selections.name: INISHFALLEN
selections.reason: Consistent runner with figures of 77 and 83. The logical alternative if the favorite fails to fire.

selections.name: EXQUISITE ACCLAIM
selections.reason: Ran a big 82 two starts back. 7-2 odds are fair for a horse with this speed potential.

selections.name: VENETIAN
selections.reason: erratic but capable. Hit an 82 recently but followed with a 69. A boom-or-bust type for exotics.

danger_horse.name: INISHFALLEN
danger_horse.reason: Proven consistency at this level and distance.

selections.name: ARRIETTY
selections.reason: Best recent form in the race with a 70 and 77. The 77 figure is significantly higher than the average here.

selections.name: DIVELMENT
selections.reason: Steady performer with back-to-back 58s. Should appreciate the distance.

selections.name: NICELY TIMED (GB)
selections.reason: Ran a 63 two starts back. Disappointed last time but has the ability to hit the board.

selections.name: GHAIYYATH DEER
selections.reason: First-time starter from a top barn (Dermot Weld). Market watch required.

danger_horse.name: GHAIYYATH DEER
danger_horse.reason: Unknown quantity with pedigree/connections to win on debut.

exotic_strategy.strategy: Win 8. Exacta 8-1. Saver on 2 if odds drop.

selections.name: PALMEZZANO
selections.reason: Most consistent profile with recent figures of 75 and 84. Looks ready to break the maiden.

selections.name: QAMARI
selections.reason: Ran a solid 73 in latest effort. Improving type who fits well here.

selections.name: TYRAXES
selections.reason: Posted a 72 recently. 2-1 morning line suggests strong support.

selections.name: KIDAM ROQUE (FR)
selections.reason: Has a high figure of 81 on the resume but inconsistent (49 last time). Dangerous if he runs to his best.

danger_horse.name: KIDAM ROQUE (FR)
danger_horse.reason: The 81 speed figure is the highest in the field, making him a threat despite recent poor run.

selections.name: WALHAAN
selections.reason: Class of the field. Recent 83 on the flat and a 101 over hurdles. Should handle this group.

selections.name: CINAMMON COCO
selections.reason: Consistent sort with an 80 figure recently. Won on the flat with a 77 prior.

selections.name: TRISHULI RIVER
selections.reason: Solid recent form (71, 74). Reliable check-getter.

selections.name: UMALA
selections.reason: Tried Group 3 company (tailed off) but won a maiden with a 71. Class drop makes her interesting.

danger_horse.name: CINAMMON COCO
danger_horse.reason: Very consistent and likely to be in the mix at the finish.
